quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

quotes.quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Ordinary people think merely of spending time, great people think of using it.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The difference between successful people and very successful people is that very successful people say no to almost everything.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: The true price of anything you do is the amount of time you exchange for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: If you have time to whine then you have time to find a solution.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Artner

quotes.quote: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
quotes.author: Peter Marshall

quotes.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The tragedy of life doesn’t lie in not reaching your goal. The tragedy lies in having no goal to reach.
quotes.author: Benjamin Mays

quotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You will never win if you never begin.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: The way to achieve your own success is to be willing to help somebody else get it first.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
